Reviews.Title: Nice phone....
Reviews.Author: D. Berry "mardyn"
Reviews.Content: Bought this phone for my Mom, works great for her, plenty of features, nice keyboard, nice & loud, seems to get good reception too.The only thing I don't like is the 'Rogers' branding on the phone & embedded within the display. I'd give it 9 out of 10 rating.

Reviews.Title: didn't like it, returned it
Reviews.Author: J. Smith "keystone"
Reviews.Content: it would not read my memory card so I couldn't use my own pics and ringtones. i returned it, and will stay with my old one.

Reviews.Title: new old phone
Reviews.Author: debra
Reviews.Content: My husband is a stick in the mud kind of guy, he had to have another one of these phones, Doesn't want the new phones, sticks with what works for him.

Reviews.Title: satisfaction
Reviews.Author: Mary Dalton
Reviews.Content: I'm happy with this phone because it's just like the one I replaced, so the change was with minimum effort.

Reviews.Title: Not so good
Reviews.Author: Richard Wyckoff
Reviews.Content: Bought these flip-phones for me and my wife.  All we want to do is talk, plus I use the Calendar for reminders.  Also wanted to swap out the SIM card when we travel. We were disappointed with this phone: the screen is fuzzy and small; we had to charge the battery frequently; and one phone stopped working after a week.  So I returned them both and got Samsung GT-C3520 models instead, which are worlds better.

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported.
Sleek clamshell phone in black with VGA camera also captures video up to 15 seconds; multi-format digital audio player; Bluetooth stereo music
MicroSD expansion and USB connectivity; full duplex speakerphone; suite of PIM tools
Up to 5 hours of talk time, up to 240 hours (10 days) of standby time
It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
ProductInfo.Name: Nokia 6085 Unlocked GSM Phone with Quad-Band, 0.3MP Camera and MicroSD Slot - Black
